LanguageData.VFEM_NobleWard141.title: noble ward
LanguageData.VFEM_NobleWard141.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sent to another noble’s court to be raised and educated in the ways of governance and etiquette. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to navigate the complexities of noble relationships and gained a basic understanding of leadership. Though surrounded by luxury, [PAWN_pronoun] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] time under watchful eyes.
LanguageData.VFEM_Page142.title: page
LanguageData.VFEM_Page142.description: [PAWN_nameDef] began [PAWN_possessive] training in a noble household, learning the fundamentals of serving and knightly duties. [PAWN_pronoun] spent hours cleaning armor, carrying messages, and studying basic combat techniques. The experience gave [PAWN_pronoun] an early introduction to the discipline and loyalty expected of nobility.
LanguageData.VFEM_YoungScholar143.title: young scholar
LanguageData.VFEM_YoungScholar143.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was tutored in history, philosophy, and mathematics from an early age, as was expected of highborn children. [PAWN_pronoun] showed a natural curiosity and an aptitude for learning, earning praise from [PAWN_possessive] tutors. Though well-read, [PAWN_pronoun] had little experience with manual or practical work.
LanguageData.VFEM_CastlePlaymate144.title: castle playmate
LanguageData.VFEM_CastlePlaymate144.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood running through the halls and courtyards of a castle, playing games with other noble children. The carefree years gave [PAWN_pronoun] a strong sense of camaraderie and a basic understanding of courtly manners. However, the sheltered life left [PAWN_pronoun] naive about the struggles of common folk.
LanguageData.VFEM_AspiringKnight145.title: aspiring knight
LanguageData.VFEM_AspiringKnight145.description: [PAWN_nameDef] trained from an early age in the art of combat, preparing for the day [PAWN_pronoun] could earn [PAWN_possessive] place among the knights of [PAWN_possessive] house. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced with wooden swords and sparred with instructors, learning discipline and honor. While young, [PAWN_pronoun] already showed promise as a warrior.
LanguageData.VFEM_HeirToTheEstate146.title: heir to the estate
LanguageData.VFEM_HeirToTheEstate146.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised to inherit the family estate, receiving lessons in administration and diplomacy from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught to manage resources, oversee servants, and maintain order among the household. The structured upbringing prepared [PAWN_pronoun] for leadership but left little time for play.
LanguageData.VFEM_ScribeInTraining147.title: scribe in training
LanguageData.VFEM_ScribeInTraining147.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent long hours learning to read and write under the guidance of a family-appointed tutor. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced copying texts and recording transactions, developing a keen eye for detail. While skilled in intellectual pursuits, [PAWN_pronoun] had little exposure to physical labor or combat training.
LanguageData.VFEM_CourtAttendant148.title: court attendant
LanguageData.VFEM_CourtAttendant148.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up serving as a junior attendant in a royal court, learning the nuances of etiquette and the art of flattery. [PAWN_pronoun] observed the dealings of nobles and practiced [PAWN_possessive] own skills in negotiation and charm. Though immersed in the intrigue of the court, [PAWN_pronoun] rarely ventured beyond its walls.
LanguageData.VFEM_FalconryStudent149.title: falconry student
LanguageData.VFEM_FalconryStudent149.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth learning the noble pastime of falconry, training birds to hunt and obey commands. [PAWN_pronoun] developed patience and a keen understanding of animal behavior. Though the skill impressed others, [PAWN_pronoun] had little time for practical tasks outside the sport.
LanguageData.VFEM_AspiringDiplomat150.title: aspiring diplomat
LanguageData.VFEM_AspiringDiplomat150.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was groomed for a future in diplomacy, studying languages, geography, and the customs of foreign courts. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced making speeches and mediating minor disputes among peers. Though still young, [PAWN_pronoun] showed promise as a skilled negotiator and tactician.
LanguageData.VFEM_Squire151.title: оруженосец
LanguageData.VFEM_Squire151.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticed to a knight, tasked with maintaining armor, tending horses, and learning the code of chivalry. [PAWN_pronoun] spent countless hours observing battles and practicing with training weapons. The rigorous training instilled discipline and a desire to prove [PAWN_possessive] worth on the battlefield.
LanguageData.VFEM_ShieldCarrier152.title: shield carrier
LanguageData.VFEM_ShieldCarrier152.description: [PAWN_nameDef] trained alongside warriors, serving as a shield carrier during skirmishes and drills. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to endure long marches and protect [PAWN_possessive] mentors in the heat of battle. Though young, [PAWN_pronoun] displayed courage and determination beyond [PAWN_possessive] years.
LanguageData.VFEM_CastleDefender153.title: castle defender
LanguageData.VFEM_CastleDefender153.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in a fortified castle and spent [PAWN_possessive] days training with guards and learning the basics of siege defense. [PAWN_pronoun] practiced with bows on the battlements and drilled with spears in the courtyard. The life gave [PAWN_pronoun] a strong sense of duty and early combat experience.
LanguageData.VFEM_BannerBearer154.title: banner bearer
LanguageData.VFEM_BannerBearer154.description: [PAWN_nameDef] carried the family banner into drills and parades, learning to represent [PAWN_possessive] house with pride. [PAWN_pronoun] spent hours practicing marching formations and staying composed under scrutiny. Though not a frontline fighter, [PAWN_pronoun] gained valuable lessons in discipline and leadership.
LanguageData.VFEM_ArcherTrainee155.title: archer trainee
LanguageData.VFEM_ArcherTrainee155.description: [PAWN_nameDef] began training with a bow from a young age, aiming for skill and precision as required of noble warriors. [PAWN_pronoun] spent hours drawing targets in the courtyard and practicing long-distance shots. The training honed [PAWN_possessive] focus and gave [PAWN_pronoun] an edge in ranged combat.
LanguageData.VFEM_MerchantsProdigy156.title: merchant's prodigy
LanguageData.VFEM_MerchantsProdigy156.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up surrounded by the bustling trade of [PAWN_possessive] family’s business, watching deals unfold and goods change hands. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught the art of negotiation and the importance of wealth. Though well-versed in trade, [PAWN_pronoun] had little exposure to the struggles of common life.
LanguageData.VFEM_EstateHeir157.title: estate heir
LanguageData.VFEM_EstateHeir157.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on a sprawling estate, learning to oversee the household and manage the laborers who worked the land. [PAWN_pronoun] received lessons in stewardship and basic leadership, preparing [PAWN_objective] for a life of privilege. Though competent, [PAWN_pronoun] had little understanding of life beyond [PAWN_possessive] family’s wealth.
LanguageData.VFEM_LavishUpbringing158.title: lavish upbringing
LanguageData.VFEM_LavishUpbringing158.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was surrounded by luxury from birth, never knowing hunger or hardship. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught courtly manners and spent [PAWN_possessive] days enjoying music, fine food, and leisure. While refined and confident, [PAWN_pronoun] struggled with practical tasks that required hard labor.
LanguageData.VFEM_PatronOfTheArts159.title: patron of the arts
LanguageData.VFEM_PatronOfTheArts159.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was encouraged to pursue and support the arts, attending performances and commissioning works from talented craftsmen. [PAWN_pronoun] developed an appreciation for beauty and creativity, as well as a talent for recognizing skill in others. Though cultured, [PAWN_pronoun] was sheltered from the harsher realities of life.
LanguageData.VFEM_PrivilegedScholar160.title: privileged scholar
LanguageData.VFEM_PrivilegedScholar160.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had access to the finest tutors, studying history, philosophy, and the sciences from a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] showed promise in academic pursuits, impressing [PAWN_possessive] family with [PAWN_possessive] keen intellect. However, [PAWN_pronoun] had little understanding of the struggles faced by those less fortunate.
LanguageData.VFEM_ShadowedOutcast161.title: shadowed outcast
LanguageData.VFEM_ShadowedOutcast161.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was feared by the villagers for reasons whispered but never explained. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood in the shadows, avoiding those who glared or crossed themselves at [PAWN_possessive] presence. The isolation hardened [PAWN_objective], leaving [PAWN_pronoun] mistrustful and quiet, always watching from the dark corners.
LanguageData.VFEM_ChildOfTheEclipse162.title: child of the eclipse
LanguageData.VFEM_ChildOfTheEclipse162.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born under an ominous eclipse, a sign that filled the villagers with dread. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up under the weight of grim superstition, with some believing [PAWN_pronoun] brought bad luck or worse. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to navigate the fear of others, growing cunning and detached to survive.
LanguageData.VFEM_GraveyardWanderer163.title: graveyard wanderer
LanguageData.VFEM_GraveyardWanderer163.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] days among the headstones, speaking to the dead as though they were alive. [PAWN_pronoun] was drawn to the quiet stillness and the stories carved into weathered stone. The villagers whispered of [PAWN_possessive] odd habits, and [PAWN_pronoun] learned to keep [PAWN_possessive] thoughts hidden from prying eyes.
LanguageData.VFEM_VillageCurseBearer164.title: village curse-bearer
LanguageData.VFEM_VillageCurseBearer164.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was believed to be cursed, blamed for every ill fortune that befell the village. Crops failed, livestock died, and villagers fell ill, all under [PAWN_possessive] dark shadow. [PAWN_pronoun] grew to expect rejection, developing a cold resilience to survive in a world that feared [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.VFEM_WhisperedFoundling165.title: whispered foundling
LanguageData.VFEM_WhisperedFoundling165.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was discovered as an infant at the edge of the woods, wrapped in tattered cloth and left in the rain. The villagers took [PAWN_objective] in reluctantly, always murmuring of unnatural origins. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in the shadow of suspicion, learning to remain unseen and unheard.
LanguageData.VFEM_YoungDiplomat166.title: young diplomat
LanguageData.VFEM_YoungDiplomat166.description: [PAWN_nameDef] surprised [PAWN_possessive] elders by brokering a truce between feuding noble families at just twelve years old. [PAWN_pronoun] used charm and logic to persuade both sides, earning respect far beyond [PAWN_possessive] years. The experience cemented [PAWN_possessive] place as a rising star in courtly politics.
LanguageData.VFEM_ProdigiousTactician167.title: prodigious tactician
LanguageData.VFEM_ProdigiousTactician167.description: [PAWN_nameDef] demonstrated a gift for strategy by organizing and winning a mock battle between the castle’s squires. [PAWN_pronoun] anticipated [PAWN_possessive] opponents’ moves and used the terrain to [PAWN_possessive] advantage, earning the admiration of seasoned knights. The event marked [PAWN_objective] as a promising future commander.
LanguageData.VFEM_YoungArchitect168.title: young architect
LanguageData.VFEM_YoungArchitect168.description: [PAWN_nameDef] designed an innovative irrigation system for the family estate at just ten years old, greatly increasing crop yields. [PAWN_pronoun] impressed both the stewards and laborers with [PAWN_possessive] ingenuity. The success ensured [PAWN_pronoun] would be taken seriously, even at such a young age.
LanguageData.VFEM_PrizeArcher169.title: prize archer
LanguageData.VFEM_PrizeArcher169.description: [PAWN_nameDef] won a prestigious archery competition at the age of thirteen, besting older and more experienced opponents. [PAWN_pronoun] was praised for [PAWN_possessive] precision and composure under pressure. The victory brought honor to [PAWN_possessive] family and set [PAWN_objective] on a path of future acclaim.
LanguageData.VFEM_BuddingPoet170.title: budding poet
LanguageData.VFEM_BuddingPoet170.description: [PAWN_nameDef] composed an epic poem at a young age that spread throughout the region, earning [PAWN_pronoun] fame and admiration. Nobles and commoners alike recited [PAWN_possessive] verses, praising their vivid imagery and emotional depth. The success brought invitations to courts across the land.
